Hello. I'm new to this list, but I guess we can jump right in?

> Should there be a maxium amount of health points a character can
> have?  I have had summoned images/fire elementals/raised
> skeletons/ghosts with health points listed as negative numbers.

There already is a maximum, I believe. If the amount of hp gets beyond
some number (I think 32k), it wraps down to negatives. The reason is that
they're probably using a signed integer for the hp (2^16 bits, half of
them negative), so the maximum hp can be 32768. After that, all the bits
become 0 and there's a 1 out in front of the integer somewhere, and the
integer is read as all of the 0s (I think), making it -32768.

Anyways, limiting that number to 30000 or so would make a lot of cheaters'
lives less confusing.

> Should there be a maximum amount of mana a character can have?  I have
> had summoned images/fire elementals/raised skeletons/ghosts with
> health points listed as negative numbers.

I think mp is handled the same as hp.


- Zardus
